### Application : Fine-tuning a Image-to-3D diffusion model {.smaller}

Hi-3DGen finetunes TRELLIS, an Image to 3D model, using synthetic detailed Image-3D pairs
![&nbsp; ](images/hi_3Dgen.png)

## {.smaller}

### Application : Fine-tuning a Image-to-3D diffusion model {.smaller}

Hi-3DGen is able to capture finer details from images compared to the initial TRELLIS model

![Trellis vs Hi-3DGen](images/lateral_merged_image.png)

### Application: Discovering Human-Object Interaction {.smaller}

CHORUS learns Human-Object interaction from synthetic images.

![&nbsp; ](images/chorus.png)

## Image correspondence

Diffusion models implicitly learns correspondences. The features of a trained denoiser can be used for zero-shot image correspondences (no fine-tuning).

![&nbsp; ](images/dift.png){.r-stretch}
